pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package is used to pull key people from a company based on the ticker.from Key-People import get_Key_People, Key_People, get_c_Namelist_of_key_people = get_Key_People("AAPL")company_Name = get_c_Name("AAPL")#if you are doing multiple entries and want to make it quickerdb = Key_People()entry = db.entry("AAPL")entry.company_Nameentry.key_Peopleentry.ticker
